name: tm65
effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
